pageProduct.name: Panadol with Optizorb Paracetamol Pain Relief Caplets 500mg 96
pageProduct.description:
Information

Benefits of Panadol Optizorb

• It provides fast, effective and temporary relief of pain

• Advanced absorption compared to regular Panadol tablets

• Caplets are oval-shaped, as well as film-coated, making them easier to swallow and leaving no bitter aftertaste

When to Use Panadol Optizorb?

Panadol Optizorb with patented Optizorb formulation provides fast effective temporary relief of pain and discomfort associated with:

• Headache/Tension headache

• Migraine headache

• Muscular aches

• Backache

• Arthritis/Osteoarthritis

• Period pain

• Toothache

Why Choose Panadol Optizorb?

Panadol with Optizorb is a smart choice as it provides advanced absorption* compared to regular Panadol tablets.

Panadol with Optizorb contains a patented delivery system which allows it to deliver paracetamol more efficiently* to the body, relieving pain whilst remaining gentle on stomachs.**

*Faster absorption than regular Panadol tablets

**When used as directed

Explore our Range

Panadol Extra

• The ingredients in Panadol Extra are a clinically proven combination of ingredients to fight tough pain

• Each caplet contains paracetamol and caffeine, plus advanced Optizorb technology, designed to fight five types of tough pain

Panadol Rapid

• Panadol Rapid Is absorbed twice as fast as regular Panadol tablets

Panadol Optizorb

• The Optizorb Formulation contains a patented delivery system which allows it to deliver paracetamol more efficiently by breaking down faster than regular Panadol tablets

Panadol Mini Caps

• A physically smaller capsule-shaped tablet with a smooth gelatin coating for easy swallowing

• No gluten, lactose or sugar

Panadol Osteo

• The paracetamol in Panadol Osteo Is released In 2 stages, with the first stage being released quickly, for rapid onset of action, and the second stage being released slowly over the day or night, to provide prolonged pain relief

• Panadol Osteo tablets are gentle on the stomach*

*When used as directed

This medicine may not be right for you. Read the warnings before purchase. Follow the directions for use. If symptoms persist, talk to your healthcare professional. Incorrect use could be harmful.

General Information

Panadol Optizorb Paracetamol 500mg with Optizorb is formulated to deliver a fast and effective temporary relief of pain. Gentle on stomachs and is absorbed faster than regular Panadol tablets.

What this medicine is used for:
Fast effective temporary relief of pain and discomfort associated with:
- Headache/ Tension headache.
- Migraine headache.
- Muscular aches.
- Backache.
- Arthritis/Osteoarthritis.
- Period pain.
- Toothache.
- Cold & flu symptoms. Reduces fever.

Suitable For: People with stomach ulcers, Breastfeeding mothers.

Boxed Contents: 96 Caplets (capsule shaped tablets)

Size: 96 Pack

Warnings

Do not use Panadol:
- If you are allergic to paracetamol or hydroxybenzoates.
- If using other medicines containing paracetamol.
- For children below age 7, except on medical advice.
- For more than 48 hours for children aged 7-17 except on medical advice.
- For more than a few days at a time in adults except on medical advice.
- If any of the seals on this packaging are broken.
- If the package use-by date below has expired.
- Until you read the enclosed leaflet carefully

Ask a doctor before use:
- If you have liver or kidney problems.
- If you are taking warfarin (a medicine used to thin the blood).

Stop use and see your doctor immediately if:
You have an allergic skin reaction, shortness of breath or wheezing after taking Panadol.

CAUTION
Keep out of reach of children.
Use only if seals are intact.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION
Does not contain gluten, lactose or sugar.

FIRST AID INFORMATION
While using this product if an overdose is taken or suspected, ring the Poisons Information Centre (AUST: 13 11 26; NZ 0800 764 766) or go to the hospital immediately, even if you feel well because of the risk of delayed, serious liver damage if left untreated. Keep to the recommended dose

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Does not contain gluten, lactose or sugar.

FIRST AID INFORMATION

While using this product
If an overdose is taken or suspected, ring the Poisons Information Centre (AUST: 13 11 26; NT 0800 764 766) or go to the hospital immediately, even if you feel well because of the risk of delayed, serious liver damage if left untreated. Keep to the recommended dose.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each caplet contains Paracetamol 500mg.

Contains: Hydroxybenzoates as preservatives.

Allergen Free From: Gluten| Lactose| Sugar

Directions

Age: 12- Adult
Tablets: 1-2
How Often: every 4-6 hrs with water as required (maximum 8 caplets in 24 hrs).
Age: 7-12
Tablets: 1/2-1
How Often: every 4-6 hrs with water as required (maximum 4 caplets in 24 hrs).

USAGE ADVICE

2 way safety seal system.
Use only if seals are intact.
1. Carton safety seals.
2. Heat sealed blister.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.
